translations.translation: So they turned their backs on him.
But they turned their backs on him and went away.
So turning their backs, they went away from him.
All the people turned away from him
And they turned their backs on him and went away. (The pagans thought he would transmit the disease).
So they turned away from him and departed.
So they went away from him, turning back.
But they went away from him, turning their backs.
And they turned their backs and went away from him.
so they turned their backs on him and went off.
So they departed from him turning their backs.
So they went away leaving him behind.
So they turned away from him, and departed.
So they turned away from him, and departed (for fear of the disease).
But they turned their backs and went away from him.
But they turned their backs on him, and went away.
So they turned away from him, departing.
[37:90] So they went away, to their festival, leaving him behind.
(And they turned their backs and went away from him) they went to their festival and left him alone.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَتَوَلَّوْاْ عَنْهُ } وانصرفوا من عنده بعدما سمعوا منه القول الموحش { مُدْبِرِينَ } [الصافات: 90] رهباً ورغباً، فخرجوا من الغداة إلى الصحراء، ولم يخرج عليه السلام معهم
